original_text: But now you have become God's friends. This happened because Christ's human body died on the cross. As a result, God has brought you to himself. As you stand in front of him, you are completely good and clean inside. He sees nothing in you that is bad.
korean_text: 이제는 그의 육체의 죽음으로 말미암아 화목하게 하사 너희를 거룩하고 흠 없고 책망할 것이 없는 자로 그 앞에 세우고자 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: But now you have become God's friends.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 너희는 하나님의 친구가 되었다.

sentences.original_text: This happened because Christ's human body died on the cross.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 그리스도의 인간의 몸이 십자가에서 죽었기 때문에 일어났다.

sentences.original_text: As a result, God has brought you to himself.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 하나님은 너희를 자신에게로 이끄셨다.

sentences.original_text: As you stand in front of him,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그의 앞에 서 있을 때,

sentences.original_text: you are completely good and clean inside.
He sees nothing in you that is bad.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희 안에 나쁜 것을 아무것도 보지 않으신다.
